featured.text: Researchers at Vanderbilt University are particularly interested in zebrafish retina regeneration.
They found that lowering GABA levels in zebrafish can trigger retina regeneration, while a high level of GABA concentration will suppress the regeneration process.

definition.zh_def: 再生，指生物體恢復或重建受損或失去的部分的過程。
definition.en_def: The process of renewal, restoration, or growth of cells, tissues, or organs.
definition.example: The regeneration of the forest after the wildfire took several years.
